free: #e There was also another person passing with a goat in the early morning. He let the goat find food.
#c 有一個人也一樣早，帶著山羊經過看到他所做的，讓山羊找食物吃。
#n tang- < tan- walk。tangkakaun 找食物吃。tangkakaun-an 放牧的場地。

free: #e No one knew where the kid was going to. He went toward where they were because there was only a way.

#n pa < aupa必經之路

free: #e He stopped, seeing so many pears in baskets.
#c 他停下來，看到籃子有很多梨子。

free: #e The young boy was thinking where the pretty girl was going to. He thought the girl is so beautiful.
#c 那個年輕人在想女生到底要往哪裡？他覺得：「哇！很漂亮的女生！」
#n 女生binanauaz 漂亮 manauaz。男生minduduaz 帥 talmandu。talnahtung20幾歲 talutpu 40以上。maimi-kakua 講錯了，應該是maikakua

free: #e He looked back, not knowing there was a stone on his way front.

free: #e Because of the heavy stone, the bike hit it and fell down.
#c 因為石頭很重，所以腳踏車撞到後倒了。
#n pap-tuh 撞（到頭） or pat-nung 碰撞到。這一句應該是講錯了，應該是和下一句合起來 pan-uni

free: #e His leg also got hurt.

free: #e He fell down there, keeping rubbing his foot, not knowing there existed other kids playing around and seeing him tripping over.
#c 他撞倒在那裡，一直揉他的腳，不知道還有其他小孩也在旁邊玩耍，看到他跌倒
#n saicia類詞的重音，如果是單一代詞 (saicia)就會是saicia，如果是那個水 saicia tu danum，是詞彙間的intonation的改變，影響到單字的發音。hangsia <- sia 原來如此。
